brief: Develop a RESTful API for managing course content and user enrollments.
business_problem: Educational institutions struggle to efficiently manage course offerings and student enrollments. A streamlined API can enhance user experience and operational efficiency.
target_users: Educators and administrators at online learning platforms
goals: Create endpoints for course creation and updates
Ensure secure authentication for API access
assessment_criteria: API performance, security measures, and alignment with user needs

brief: Build a backend service to track student progress and achievements.
business_problem: Students often lack insight into their learning progress, hindering motivation. A robust tracking system can provide valuable feedback and encourage engagement.
target_users: Students and educators using online learning management systems
goals: Design a database schema for tracking student achievements
Develop API endpoints for progress retrieval
assessment_criteria: Data accuracy, user feedback integration, and system reliability

brief: Create a backend system for managing user feedback on courses.
business_problem: Course creators often lack actionable insights from user feedback, leading to stagnation. A dedicated feedback system can drive course improvements and enhance user satisfaction.
target_users: Course creators and administrators in online education platforms
goals: Implement feedback submission and retrieval endpoints
Create a dashboard for feedback analytics
Ensure data privacy and security for user submissions
assessment_criteria: User engagement metrics, data security, and feedback responsiveness
